description_en: Monthly rates of exchange of the Malaysian Ringgit vis-à-vis selected currencies.
description_ms: Kadar pertukaran ringgit Malaysia berbanding rakan dagang utama.
methodology_en:
The Malaysian ringgit (MYR) is a non-internationalised currency, meaning it can only be traded and settled within Malaysia through licensed banks under the supervision of Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM). To combat speculation, offshore trading of the ringgit is not permitted, and any foreign market activity — such as non-deliverable forwards (NDFs) — is purely indicative and settled in foreign currencies rather than MYR.

Consequently, BNM has full oversight over trading over the ringgit, and compiles official exchange rate data based on buy and sell quotations at set times on all trading days:
- 0900: Reference rate for start of day
- 1130: Best counter rates offered by selected commercial banks
- 1200: Reference rate for mid-day
- 1700: Reference rate for end of day
This monthly dataset, which is provided for analytical purposes, is derived using middle rates at 1200.
caveat_en: This data is meant for analytical purposes, and is not intended to be used as a training dataset for trading algorithms.
caveat_ms: Data ini adalah bertujuan untuk analisa ekonomi, dan bukannya sebagai input kepada algoritma perdagangan mata wang.

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01 to indicate monthly-frequency data
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD ditetapkan sebagai 01 kerana data berfrekuensi bulanan

fields.name: indicator
fields.description_en: [String] The specific computation applied. There are 5 provided in the dataset, namely the highest rate in the month ('high'), lowest rate in the month ('low'), the average across trading days in the month ('avg'), the rate on the first trading day of the month ('start'), and the rate on the last trading day of the month ('end').
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Kaedah pengiraan yang digunakan. Terdapat 5 jenis yang dibekalkan dalam set data, iaitu kadar tertinggi dalam bulan ('high'), kadar terendah dalam bulan ('low'), purata bagi semua hari perdagangan dalam bulan ('avg'), kadar pada hari perdagangan pertama dalam bulan ('start'), dan kadar pada hari perdagangan terakhir dalam bulan ('end').

fields.name: <currency_code>
fields.description_en: [Float] One of 27 columns indicating the rate of exchange of MYR to that currency (3-letter code), for that month and computation type. The currency name can be derived from the [currency code lookup table](https://data.gov.my/data-catalogue/currency_codes). It should be noted that the ringgit is the numerator, so higher values indicate a depreciation while lower values indicate an appreciation.
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Salah satu daripada 27 lajur yang menunjukkan kadar pertukaran ringgit Malaysia kepada mata wang asing (kod 3 abjad), untuk bulan dan jenis pengiraan tersebut. Nama mata wang boleh didapati daripada [jadual rujukan mata wang](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/data-catalogue/currency_codes). Ringgit digunakan sebagai pengangka, maka nilai yang lebih tinggi menunjukkan penyusutan sementara nilai yang lebih rendah menunjukkan peningkatan.
